snippet.title: Crawlers And Brawlers Trailer
snippet.description:
Crawlers and Brawlers is a RPG descended from the 8bit classics. Become an adventurer and go on a fantastic journey through 11 epic procedural generated dungeons. Collect powerful loot to develop your character then brawl online with your friends on 12 different multiplayer maps.

Buy the game here: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Crawlers-and-Brawlers/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d80258550ef4

Vote for us on Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=621246953

Music by Alexandr Zhelanov, "We Will Meet Again" http://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

Trailer produced with HitFilm3 Express: http://www.hitfilm.com
